question: Which city hosted the 2020 Summer Olympics (though held in 2021 due to the global pandemic)?
In the November 2020 election, Joe Biden was elected as the ____ President of the United States.
Which Netflix docu-series about a big-cat zoo owner named Joe Exotic became a pop-culture phenomenon in 2020?
Which Disney live-action remake, planned for release in March 2020, had its theatrical debut delayed and then partially released on Disney+?
Which music superstar released the surprise album ‘Folklore’ in July 2020?
In which month of 2020 did the WHO formally declare the COVID-19 outbreak a pandemic?
Which streaming platform premiered the acclaimed miniseries ‘The Queen’s Gambit’ in October 2020?
Which English football club ended a 30-year wait for the league title by winning the 2019–20 Premier League in June 2020?
Which global union did the United Kingdom officially exit on January 31, 2020?
Which African country was declared free of wild polio virus by the WHO in August 2020, completing Africa’s eradication of wild polio?
